baseRule.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī dhammikaṁ kathinuddhāraṁ paṭibāheyya, pācittiyaṁ.
baseRule.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 30

translations.text: Welche Nonne aber die rechtmäßige Aufhebung des Kaṭhina verzögert, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni block the dismantling of the kathina privileges in accordance with the rule, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang menghalangi pembongkaran hak-hak Kathina yang sesuai dengan aturan, itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，作如是意：『令眾僧今不得出迦絺那衣，後當出，欲令五事久得放捨。』波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 109

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。僧捨迦絺那衣時不隨者。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 136
